Privacy Policy Acceptance of this policy follows the rules of the LGPD law, and allows you to browse the platform. Learn more by clicking here Yes No Privacy Policy
By using this application, you agree to the terms and conditions described below, regarding the collection, use and sharing of your personal data, as established by the General Data Protection Law (LGPD).
1. Data Collected: The application will collect the following personal information: CPF, full name, date of birth, ID, cell phone number and email address.
2. Purpose of Collection: This data will be used exclusively to make reservations at partner establishments. The application undertakes not to use this information for any other purpose that is not explicitly described in this document.
3. Data Storage: The information collected will be stored securely on our servers for a period of 1 (one) year. After this period, the data will be automatically deleted.
4. Data Sharing: The application will share your full name, date of birth and CPF with the establishments where you make reservations. This sharing is necessary to guarantee that the reservation will be made in your name.
5. Data Security: We commit to taking the necessary measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, unauthorized disclosure or destruction.
6. Consent: By clicking "YES", you are giving your consent to the collection, use and sharing of your information as described in this policy.
7. Refusal of Consent: If you do not accept the terms of this policy, you will not be able to continue browsing and using the application.
8. Rights of the Holder: You have the right to access, correct, delete or port your data. If you wish to exercise these rights or have any questions about the processing of your data, please contact us through the channels available in the application.
9. Policy Changes: We reserve the right to make changes to this policy. If significant changes occur, we will notify users through the application or other appropriate means.
By clicking "Yes", you expressly agree to the terms of this LGPD Policy.
